body_html: @mrry After increasing request object counts, there is performance decay along with running time, at first each step only takes 0.3 second, after 4~5 hours, each step takes 1 second. There must be some severe bug or design issues.
body_text: @mrry After increasing request object counts, there is performance decay along with running time, at first each step only takes 0.3 second, after 4~5 hours, each step takes 1 second. There must be some severe bug or design issues.
body: @mrry After increasing request object counts, there is performance decay along with running time, at first each step only takes 0.3 second, after 4~5 hours, each step takes 1 second. There must be some severe bug or design issues.
